name: Cat Tower (TonicGames)
description:
Jump up the tower and get as high as you can. Watch out for falling bricks, flying birds, and striking lightning.

This is a simple platforming game made for the Secret Santa 2020 game jam. I entered the jam quite late, and had a lot of coursework to do, so I had to scale my original idea down quite a bit, but I think the game is quite fun anyway.

The Post-Jam version is similar to the Jam version but contains some minor quality of life improvements and balances, as well as a slightly smaller download size.
